### 北斗の拳世紀末カードバトル伝説 - Hokuto no Ken Card Battle Deck: Kenshiro Starter Deck
3 Kenshiro
1 Kenshiro (Defender of Love)
3 Kenshiro (Child)
2 Ryuken
3 Toki
3 Toki (Child)
2 Hokuto Hyakuretsu Ken
2 Ganzan Ryozanha
2 Hokuto Juha Zan
1 Hokuto Ujō Hagan Ken
2 Ken's Rage
2 Ken's Challenge
2 Ken's Insight
2 Ken's Reluctance
